data.name: Jester`s Theater Museum DrmFree
data.detailed_description:
DLC is intended only for those users who have problems launching the main application of the game.
If you start the game without problems, this DLC should not be installed. Read the FAQ on the game forum.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: WIN7 SP1/WIN8/WIN10/XP
  • Processor: 1.8 GHz
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 5 1024Vram
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: WIN10
  • Processor: 2.2 GHz
  • Graphics: GEFORCE GTX 10
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

content_descriptors.notes:
